Name: Rocket League
Description: Download and compete in the high-octane hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem! customize your car, hit the field, and compete in one of the most critically acclaimed sports games of all time! Download and take your shot! Hit the field by yourself or with friends in 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 Online Modes, or enjoy Extra Modes like Rumble, Snow Day, or Hoops. Unlock items in Rocket Pass, climb the Competitive Ranks, compete in Competitive Tournaments, complete Challenges, enjoy cross-platform progression and more! The field is waiting. Take your shot!

Name: Dredge
Description: DREDGE is a single-player fiDREDGE is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Name: SimCity
Description: SimCity is a city-building simulation game where players design and manage their own cities, balancing economics, zoning, and disaster responses.

Name: GTA V
Description: Grand Theft Auto V is an open-world action-adventure game featuring a massive city and multiple storylines with rich characters and criminal activities.

Name: PUBG
Description: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds is a battle royale shooter where 100 players compete to be the last person standing.

Name: The Sims 4
Description: The Sims 4 is a life simulation game where players create and control people in a virtual world, customizing their lives, homes, and stories.
